Action¶

class scripts.engine.action.Skill(user: int, target_tile: scripts.engine.world_objects.tile.Tile, direction: NewType.<locals>.new_type)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

A subclass of Skill represents a skill and holds all the data that is not dependent on the individual cast - stuff like shape, base accuracy, etc.

An instance of Skill represents an individual use of that skill, and additionally holds only the data that is tied to the individual use - stuff like the user and target.

name: str¶
description: str¶
icon_path: str¶

ignore_entities: List[int] = []¶
use()[source]¶

If uses_projectile then create a projectile to carry the skill effects. Otherwise call self.apply

_play_animation()[source]¶

Play the provided animation on the entity’s aesthetic component

apply() → Iterator[Tuple[EntityID, List[Effect]]][source]¶

An iterator over pairs of (affected entity, [effects])

abstract get_animation(aesthetic: scripts.engine.component.Aesthetic)[source]¶

Return the animation to play when executing the skill

abstract build_effects(entity: EntityID, effect_strength: float = 1.0) → List[Effect][source]¶

Build the effects of this skill applying to a single entity. Must be overridden by subclass.

_abc_impl = <_abc_data object>¶
class scripts.engine.action.Affliction(creator: int, affected_entity: int, duration: int)[source]¶

Bases: abc.ABC

A subclass of Affliction represents an affliction (a semi-permanent modifier) and holds all the data that is not dependent on the individual instances - stuff like applicable targets etc.

An instance of Affliction represents an individual application of that affliction, and holds only the data that is tied to the individual use - stuff like the user and target.

key: str¶
name: str¶
description: str¶
icon_path: str¶
required_tags: List[TargetTagType]¶

triggers: List[AfflictionTriggerType]¶

shape: ShapeType¶
shape_size: int¶

An iterator over pairs of (affected entity, [effects])

abstract build_effects(entity: int)[source]¶

Build the effects of this affliction applying to a single entity. Must be overridden by subclass.

Sets the class properties of the affliction from the class key

scripts.engine.action.properties_set_by_data(cls)[source]¶

Class decorator used for initializing class with a set properties method so as to avoid repeating code.

Class decorator used to register an action with the engine.
